data.name: Gliderman
data.detailed_description:
Welcome Gliderman

Your mission, if you accept it, is to explore this random world, while collecting points and speed boosts in the process.

In this flight game, you fly around a randomly generated world in a small glider. As you approach the terrain, you rack up points and fill up your nitro bar for later use. Try to survive for the most amount of time or trying to get a highscore or even get to the terminal velocity as fast as possible! Anything is possible.

Some Features:
  • Randomly Generated Terrain
  • Realistic aerodynamic rules
  • Smooth and relaxing but intense gameplay
data.about_the_game:
Welcome Gliderman

In this flight game, you fly around a randomly generated world in a small glider. As you approach the terrain, you rack up points and fill up your nitro bar for later use. Try to survive for the most amount of time or trying to get a highscore or even get to the terminal velocity as fast as possible! Anything is possible.

Some Features:

  • Realistic aerodynamic rules
  • Smooth and relaxing but intense gameplay
data.short_description: Gliderman is an open-world flight game where you play as a little glider trying to explore the randomly generated world around you. Pull off stunts and chase your highscore!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 650 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Quadroople Core i1000
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 12000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
